body_html: The impact is not as big anymore since we've reduced the read/write access to the two applicants only. However, a simple comparison of the updated_at timestamp with a warning in case a change has been by someone else would be nice.
body_text: The impact is not as big anymore since we've reduced the read/write access to the two applicants only. However, a simple comparison of the updated_at timestamp with a warning in case a change has been by someone else would be nice.
body: The impact is not as big anymore since we've reduced the read/write access to the two applicants only. However, a simple comparison of the `updated_at` timestamp with a warning in case a change has been by someone else would be nice.
